debates.showAs: Coroners (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Act of 1962, to provide for a verdict of Iatrogenic Suicide and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht 1962, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíorasc arb éard é Féinmharú Iatraigineach agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate and licence the sale of nitrous oxide to exempted purchasers, to prohibit the sale of nitrous oxide and nitrous oxide products to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil agus do cheadúnú díol ocsaíde nítriúla le ceannaitheoirí díolmhaithe, do thoirmeasc ocsaíd nítriúil agus táirgí ocsaíde nítriúla a dhíol le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ocsaíde Nítriúla agus Táirgí Gaolmhara, 2025

debates.showAs: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate and licence the sale of nitrous oxide to exempted purchasers, to prohibit the sale of nitrous oxide and nitrous oxide products to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil agus do cheadúnú díol ocsaíde nítriúla le ceannaitheoirí díolmhaithe, do thoirmeasc ocsaíd nítriúil agus táirgí ocsaíde nítriúla a dhíol le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ocsaíde Nítriúla agus Táirgí Gaolmhara, 2024

debates.showAs: Health (Waiting Lists) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Health (Waiting Lists) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health (Waiting Lists) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Health Act 2004 and for that purpose to provide for the conferral of additional functions on the Minister for Health in relation to setting of priorities and performance targets by that Minister in relation to maximum waiting times for health and personal social services; to amend the National Treatment Purchase Fund Board (Establishment) Order 2004 to provide for additional reporting, revised corporate governance and accountability arrangements; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta Sláinte, 2004 agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna breise a thabhairt don Aire Sláinte i ndáil leis an Aire sin do shocrú tosaíochtaí agus spriocanna feidhmíochta i ndáil le huastréimhsí feithimh i gcomhair seirbhísí sláinte agus seirbhísí sóisialta pearsanta; do leasú an Ordaithe fá Bhord an Chiste Náisiúnta um Cheannach Cóireála (Bunú), 2004 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le tuairisciú breise, rialachas corparáideach athmheasta agus socruithe i ndáil le cuntasacht; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Mental Health (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Mental Health Act 2001.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001.

debates.showAs: Coercion of a Minor (Misuse of Drugs Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Coercion of a Minor (Misuse of Drugs Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law relating to the misuse of a controlled substance and for those purposes to amend the Misuse of Drugs Act 1977 to criminalise the act of causing or coercing a minor to be in possession of a controlled substance, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le mí-úsáid substainte rialaithe agus chun na gcríoch sin do leasú an Achta um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 chun coir a dhéanamh den ghníomh arb éard é a chur faoi deara do mhionaoiseach, nó comhéigean a dhéanamh ar mhionaoiseach, substaint rialaithe a bheith ina sheilbh nó ina seilbh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Coercion of a Minor (Misuse of Drugs Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhéigean a Dhéanamh ar Mhionaoiseach (Leasú a bhaineann le Mí-Úsáid Drugaí), 2022

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Capacity to Consent to Treatment) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Mental Health (Capacity to Consent to Treatment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Mental Health (Capacity to Consent to Treatment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Mental Health Act 2001 and for that purpose to provide for the right of minors over the age of 16 to consent to mental health treatment and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceart mionaoiseach atá os cionn 16 bliana d’aois toiliú le cóireáil mheabhairshláinte agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Mental Health (Capacity to Consent to Treatment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Meabhair-Shláinte (Cumas Toiliú le Cóireáil), 2021

debates.showAs: Proceeds of Crime (Investment in Disadvantaged Communities) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Proceeds of Crime (Investment in Disadvantaged Communities) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Proceeds of Crime Act 1996 and provide that the proceeds of crime be invested in disadvantaged communities in order to help alleviate the impact of crime and help prevent the reoccurrence of criminal behaviour.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fháltais ó Choireacht, 1996 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na fáltais ó choireacht a infheistiú i bpobail faoi mhíbhuntáiste d’fhonn cabhrú le maolú a dhéanamh ar thionchar na coireachta agus d’fhonn cabhrú le cosc a chur le hatarlú iompair choiriúil.
bill.shortTitleEn: Proceeds of Crime (Investment in Disadvantaged Communities) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fháltais ó Choireacht (Infheistíocht i bPobail faoi Mhíbhuntáiste) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2020 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully including in public parks and green spaces and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2020 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad, lena n-áirítear i bpáirceanna poiblí agus i spásanna glasa, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Health (Amendment) (Dual Diagnosis: No Wrong Door) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health (Amendment) (Dual Diagnosis: No Wrong Door) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the inclusion of services for persons with dual diagnosis in the annual service plan prepared by the HSE for approval by the Minister.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go n-áireofar seirbhísí do dhaoine a bhfuil dé-fháthmheas acu sa phlean seirbhíse bliantúil arna ullmhú ag FSS lena cheadú ag an Aire.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Amendment) (Dual Diagnosis: No Wrong Door) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Leasú) (Dé-fháthmheas: Gach Doras Ceart), 2021

debates.showAs: Mental Health Parity of Esteem Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Mental Health Parity of Esteem Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to place mental health on parity with physical health; to improve provision of mental health services; to increase the quality of care for those in mental health services; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur na meabhairshláinte ar cothroime leis an tsláinte coirp; d’fheabhsú an soláthar seirbhísí meabhairshláinte; d’ardú cháilíocht an chúraim do dhaoine atá i seirbhísí meabhairshláinte; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Mental Health Parity of Esteem Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chothroime Urraime Meabhair-Shláinte, 2020

debates.showAs: Rent Freeze (Fair Rent) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Rent Freeze (Fair Rent) Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Rent Freeze (Fair Rent) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (as amended) to provide for a rent freeze for all existing and new tenancies.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le calcadh cíosa do gach tionóntacht, idir láithreach agus nua.

debates.showAs: Waste Management (Amendment) (Regulator) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Waste Management Act 1996 to require the Minister to produce a report on the appointment of an independent regulator for the domestic waste management sector, including the regulation of domestic waste charges.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Bainistiú Dramhaíola, 1996 chun a cheangal ar an Aire tuarascáil a thabhairt ar aird maidir le rialálaí neamhspleách a cheapadh don earnáil bainistithe dramhaíola tí, lena n-áirítear muirir dramhaíola tí a rialáil.
